data.lyric:
[ti:for]
[ar:ONER]
[al:for]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]for - ONER
[00:00.12]词：任子墨@Qin’s
[00:00.54]曲：任子墨@Qin’s
[00:00.96]编曲：任子墨@Qin’s
[00:01.43]混音：Matthewyh Sim
[00:01.73]母带：Alex Psaroudakis
[00:02.03]OP：坤音娱乐
[00:02.33]灵超：
[00:02.52]I see you baby
[00:05.90]You're dressing in white
[00:10.26]And smile for a while
[00:13.17]I mean you baby
[00:16.66]You're stay in my life
[00:20.69]Even I'm doing so bad
[00:23.07]岳岳：
[00:23.60]No matter the ending is happy or not
[00:26.35]Baby you just dream what you want to dream
[00:28.78]I'm falling in love with you
[00:31.27]I'm falling in love with you
[00:34.32]Love is the greatest refreshment in life
[00:36.88]I will protect you and hug you all the time
[00:39.72]Until we die
[00:42.22]Until we die
[00:44.09]卜凡：
[00:46.57]一整夜我难以入眠
[00:49.12]你躺在我身上闭上眼
[00:51.91]房里的灯熄灭
[00:54.26]除了你我眼中目无一切
[00:56.83]浴室里的雾气带一丝迷离
[00:59.33]你在玻璃上悄悄画个心
[01:01.89]那一瞬间我紧紧抱住你
[01:04.58]木子洋：
[01:05.00]顷刻之间
[01:05.59]我想和你依偎一起
[01:09.30]Yea 依偎一起
[01:15.45]顷刻之间
[01:16.52]我想和你依偎一起
[01:20.05]Yea 依偎一起
[01:25.78]我想和你在夜空里飞行
[01:29.29]合：
[01:29.48]我们漂浮在孤独里相遇
[01:34.84]是偶然还是命中注定
[01:38.09]木子洋：
[01:38.70]I see you baby
[01:42.58]you're dressing in white
[01:46.17]And smile for a while
[01:49.11]I mean you baby
[01:53.07]You're stay in my life
[01:56.82]Even I'm doing so bad
[01:58.75]岳岳/灵超：
[01:59.73]No matter the ending is happy or not
[02:02.24]Baby you Just dream what you want to dream
[02:04.85]木子洋/卜凡：
[02:05.62]I'm falling in love with you
[02:07.71]I'm falling in love with you
[02:09.59]岳岳/灵超：
[02:10.47]Love is the greatest refreshment in life
[02:12.88]I will protect you and hug you all the time
[02:15.65]木子洋/卜凡：
[02:16.38]Until we die
[02:18.41]Until we die
[02:20.05]卜凡：
[02:20.93]I got feeling right
[02:22.64]I got feeling good
[02:24.01]合拍你多可爱
[02:25.21]我脸上多无奈
[02:26.52]制造浪漫晚餐
[02:27.85]显得我不老派
[02:29.14]说吃完出去嗨
[02:30.46]我还真不习惯
[02:31.67]岳岳：
[02:31.99]玩游戏你耍赖
[02:33.29]我装作不愉快
[02:34.49]只要你缠着我
[02:35.91]仍在你手下败
[02:37.17]你的出现对我而言是意外
[02:39.76]乘着风打破我平静的心海
[02:42.25]灵超：
[02:42.56]你懒散躺在未来
[02:44.33]我们心跳中比赛
[02:45.67]开车听话不开快
[02:46.85]副驾给你不对外
[02:48.85]All for you babe
[02:51.33]顷刻之间
[02:52.34]我想和你依偎一起
[02:53.72]木子洋：
[02:54.14]不该闯入我脑袋
[02:55.02]我从不喜欢依赖
[02:56.24]无法避开你的爱
[02:57.55]枷锁被贸然打开
[02:59.54]Because of you babe
[03:02.20]我想和你在阳光下旅行
[03:04.67]灵超：
[03:04.95]I see you baby
[03:07.28]You're dressing in white
[03:11.63]And smile for a while
[03:13.31]岳岳：
[03:14.40]I mean you baby
[03:18.28]You're stay in my life
[03:22.14]Even I'm doing so bad
[03:23.97]卜凡：
[03:24.36]Sing a song for you
[03:25.36]合：
[03:25.50]No matter the ending is happy or not
[03:27.72]Baby you Just dream what you want to dream
[03:30.31]I'm falling in love with you
[03:32.51]I'm falling in love with you
[03:35.82]Love is the greatest refreshment in life
[03:38.25]I will protect you and hug you all the time
[03:41.22]Until we die
[03:43.55]Until we die
